title: robofleet-dashboard
description: Robofleet-dashboard is a web-based interface built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS for visualizing and interacting with robotic fleet data. This project provides a user-friendly dashboard for monitoring robot status, task progress, and other key performance indicators within a Robofleet system, focusing on real-time data display and intuitive control functionalities. The repository is focused on a specific project and its implementation details.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: dynamic-event-calendar is a JavaScript, CSS, and HTML-based project that implements a dynamic and interactive event calendar. This repository provides a customizable and responsive calendar component for displaying and managing events, allowing users to easily view scheduled activities, add new events, and navigate through different dates. It serves as a practical example of front-end development techniques and best practices in building interactive web applications.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: This repository contains a full-stack web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, Supabase, and Tailwind CSS for real-time IoT asset tracking. It's a project demonstrating how to build a modern, scalable, and user-friendly interface for monitoring and managing IoT devices, incorporating authentication, data storage, and visualization. The app focuses on providing a clear and efficient way to track asset location and status, leveraging the power of Supabase's database and authentication services.

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a modern project management and collaboration tool built with Next.js 14 using the Pages Router, TypeScript, and Material UI (MUI). It leverages React Query for efficient data fetching and caching, providing a seamless user experience for managing tasks, projects, and teams. This repository serves as a practical example of building a full-stack application with cutting-edge web technologies.

title: resume
description: This repository hosts the source code for my resume, built using LaTeX for professional typesetting and HTML for potential online presentation. It serves as a project showcasing my skills in document creation and web development, utilizing both TeX for a polished print-ready version and HTML for a web-friendly alternative.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing a modern dashboard implementation using the Next.js framework. This repository serves as a practical example of building a responsive and interactive user interface, demonstrating best practices for structuring a Next.js application with a focus on data visualization and user experience. It's a great resource for developers looking to learn or implement dashboard functionality within their own Next.js projects.

title: raven-v2
description: Raven-v2 is a project built using TypeScript and JavaScript, focusing on [Insert a key purpose or functionality derived from the README, e.g., efficient data visualization, streamlined task management, real-time communication]. This repository contains the codebase for [Mention a core component or feature, e.g., the user interface, the backend API, the data processing pipeline] and explores topics related to [List key areas of focus, e.g., front-end development, data structures, algorithm optimization, or specific industry applications].

title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep-debt-tracker is a web application built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML designed to help users track and manage their sleep debt. This project provides a user-friendly interface to log sleep hours, calculate sleep debt based on individual sleep goals, and visualize sleep patterns over time, all while leveraging modern web development practices and serving as a practical TypeScript learning exercise.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a dynamic web application built with TypeScript, CSS, JavaScript, and HTML using Vite.js and Express.js to interact with the Gemini API, allowing users to have engaging and intelligent conversations. This project showcases a modern approach to building interactive applications using cutting-edge technologies and explores the possibilities of AI-powered communication.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next-Idea-Board is a project built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, serving as a digital idea board and project management tool. This repository showcases a modern web application allowing users to brainstorm, organize, and track ideas within a visual and collaborative environment. Leveraging modern web development practices, it aims to provide a user-friendly interface for enhanced project planning and execution.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository, built using Jupyter Notebook and Python, serves as a practical project demonstrating financial analysis techniques. It explores various aspects of finance using Python, providing hands-on examples and implementations. Check the repository for financial modeling, data analysis, and other finance-related applications implemented in Python.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: Map-Visualisation is a project leveraging HTML and Python to create interactive and insightful map visualizations. This repository contains the code for building and deploying custom map-based representations, focusing on geographical data analysis and display. It explores techniques for rendering map layers, integrating data overlays, and providing user-friendly controls for exploring the visualized information.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a Python-based CRUD application built with Flask and PostgreSQL. This project provides a foundation for creating, reading, updating, and deleting data, leveraging HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting for a complete web application experience. It serves as a practical example for learning and implementing Python-based web development, demonstrating database integration, front-end design, and server-side logic within a well-structured project.

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a full-stack web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to provide a simple and intuitive platform for creating and participating in polls and voting events. This project showcases modern web development practices and explores features like user authentication, data persistence (implementation not specified but implied by the project topic), and real-time updates to offer a seamless voting experience. It's a valuable resource for developers interested in learning about Next.js and building interactive, user-focused applications.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool for visualizing and analyzing log data generated by Robot Operating System (ROS) applications. Built using JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and shell scripting, this project provides a user-friendly interface to parse, filter, and display ROS log messages, aiding in debugging and understanding robot behavior. It facilitates project-based learning and offers a convenient way to monitor ROS system performance.

title: atg-world
description: ATG-World is a web-based project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, focused on [mention a specific feature or goal from the README if available, otherwise say "exploring web development concepts"]. This repository serves as a [mention purpose from the README, e.g., portfolio piece, learning exercise, etc.] showcasing [mention key skills demonstrated, e.g., front-end development skills, data visualization techniques, etc.].

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-Seller is a modern e-commerce platform built using Next.js 14 with the Pages Router, TypeScript, and React Query for efficient data fetching. This project showcases best practices for building type-safe and performant web applications, incorporating MUI for a clean and responsive UI. It provides a functional online store experience, serving as a learning resource and template for those interested in modern web development with these technologies.
